system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft. Can be used as a drop pod, travelling at 100 AUs downwards, cannot make maneuvres but can change landing if 500km above to within 25km to original position. Shooting at drop pod has -30 while in flight. When landing scatter by 2d10 metres, afterwards can take off again. All shooting against it has -10 while it is mobile (doesn't stack with -30 while falling). Can afix itself to starship without test, and burrow through in 2 Full Rounds. Has Craft Rating of +5 and squadron size of 15 for Attack Craft Purposes. Can only acquire if allied with Chaos Reavers.
